txt.en: 'Hope those tools ain't been banged up too much. Can't afford to replace them!'
'Too bad I've got no skill with a blade. Make short work of that mad boar, I would!'
'Can't wait to get started on helping Archet get back to its feet again.'
'Heard tell there's Rangers wandering these parts. Wonder if we'll meet one of 'em?'
'This job'll pay enough to replace that cart we lost to the boar... I hope.'
